All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Application entity class representing a student's application to an internship.
ApplicationManager
Application Manager - Handles application-related operations
ApplicationRepository
Application Repository - Manages application data storage and retrieval Provides data access methods for application entities
ApplicationStatus
Enumeration for application status in the internship management system.
BaseMenu
Base Menu - Abstract base class for all user-specific menus Provides common functionality and interface
CareerCenterStaff
Career Center Staff entity class representing administrative users.
CareerCenterStaffMenu
Career Center Staff Menu - Interface for career center staff users
CompanyRepresentative
Company Representative entity class representing users from companies.
CompanyRepresentativeMenu
Company Representative Menu - Interface for company representative users.
DataManager
Data Manager - Handles file I/O operations for data persistence
FilterUIHelper
Filter UI Helper - Provides common filter input methods Reduces code duplication across menu classes
IdGenerator
Generates unique IDs for entities.
InternshipFilterSettings
Filter Settings for Internship Listings Stores user filter preferences for the current session
InternshipLevel
Enumeration for internship difficulty levels.
InternshipManager
Internship Manager - Handles internship-related operations
InternshipOpportunity
Internship Opportunity entity class representing an internship posting.
InternshipRepository
Internship Repository - Manages internship data storage and retrieval Provides data access methods for internship opportunities
InternshipStatus
Enumeration for internship opportunity status.
Main
Main class for the Internship Placement Management System Entry point of the application
MainMenu
Main Menu - Entry point for the application interface
Major
Enumeration for student majors and academic programs.
Student
Student entity class representing a student user in the internship management system.
StudentMenu
Student Menu - Interface for student users
SystemManager
System Manager - Application Context for the Internship Management System Manages dependency injection and application lifecycle Implements Singleton pattern to ensure single instance Responsible for managing users, internships, applications, and pending approvals.
User
Abstract base class for all users in the Internship Placement Management System.
UserManager
User Manager - Handles user-related operations Responsible for authentication, registration, approval, and user listings.
UserRepository
User Repository - Manages user data storage and retrieval Provides data access methods for user entities
